PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-18162005-10-25TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Transport Act
PrecisEnactment of the COMMERCIAL VEHICLE DRIVERS HOURS OF SERVICE REGULATIONS which establish the maximum number of hours behind the wheel and the minimum number of off-duty hours for commercial vehicle (bus and truck) drivers employed or otherwise engaged in extra-provincial transportation, which will come into force on January 1, 2007.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2005-0313 Publication Date: 2005-11-16
AttachmentsAttachment
